ComicInfo.Summary: Headless Horseman: Belle encounters a headless horseman who is under the control of three inexperienced witches. She breaks the spell that binds him but the witches escape, only to be punished by the witch they all work for.
ComicInfo.Characters: Louis Otts [Candlestick] (cameo flashback),Belle [Anabelle DiMarco],Sandra,Eleanor DiMarco (cameo flashback),Natalie,Izzy,Joseph DiMarco (cameo flashback),Mel,Headless Horseman [John Marsters],Mother Margaret
ComicInfo.Colorist: Ivan Nunes,Juanmar,Mohan Sivakami,Urszula Mos,Juan Manuel Rodriguez,Juan Manuel Rodriguez
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Eric Basaldua,Harvey Tolibao,Igor Vitorino,Ivan Nunes,Jagdish Kumar,John Royle,Josh Burns,Michael Dooney,Mohan Sivakami,Sun Khamunaki,Urszula Mos
ComicInfo.Title: Headless Horseman
